attributes.title: Just Cause 3 Rap - "I Don't Need a Reason"
attributes.caption: You've been asking and here it is: Just Cause 3 Rap!
attributes.description: You've been asking and here it is: Just Cause 3 Rap!
attributes.display_title: Just Cause 3 Rap - "I Don't Need a Reason"

attributes.title: League of Legends Rap - "Out of Your League"
attributes.caption: Biggest PC game in the world...It's about time we threw a rap its way.
attributes.description: Biggest PC game in the world...It's about time we threw a rap its way.
attributes.display_title: League of Legends Rap - "Out of Your League"

attributes.title: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 Rap
attributes.caption: The (rap) battle between Plant and Zombie continues with our second PVZ Garden Warfare 2 song.
attributes.description: The (rap) battle between Plant and Zombie continues with our second PVZ Garden Warfare 2 song.
attributes.display_title: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 Rap

attributes.title: Far Cry Primal Rap - "Let Your Soul Walk Free"
attributes.caption: Ubisoft gambled with this game's setting being prehistoric, but we loved it and allowed us to try out some new things musically. Thank you to Miracle of Sound for their vocals.
attributes.description: Ubisoft gambled with this game's setting being prehistoric, but we loved it and allowed us to try out some new things musically. Thank you to Miracle of Sound for their vocals.
attributes.display_title: Far Cry Primal Rap - "Let Your Soul Walk Free"

attributes.title: Rocket League Rap - "Ready for Liftoff"
attributes.caption: Rocket League is our new favorite game! Giving it a rap was a no brainer.
attributes.description: Rocket League is our new favorite game! Giving it a rap was a no brainer.

attributes.title: World of Tanks Rap - "Rolling Out"
attributes.caption: Special thanks to World of Tanks and Wargaming.net who collaborated with us on this track!
attributes.description: Special thanks to World of Tanks and Wargaming.net who collaborated with us on this track!

attributes.title: Wolfenstein Rap Revisited - "The Doomed Order"
attributes.caption: We revisit our Wolfenstein Rap but add in female vocals for the chorus. Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.
attributes.description: We revisit our Wolfenstein Rap but add in female vocals for the chorus. Thank you to Andrea Storm Kaden for her vocals.

attributes.title: Quantum Break Rap - "Screams of Time"
attributes.caption: Quantum Break took us by surprise and we LOVED IT. So here's this Music Video to show our adoration.
attributes.description: Quantum Break took us by surprise and we LOVED IT. So here's this Music Video to show our adoration.

attributes.title: Battleborn Rap - "Born to Battle"
attributes.caption: Unfortunately this game was doomed from the start with the launch of Overwatch, but let's not forget the awesome universe that Gearbox built here. We hope this song reminds you of that!
attributes.description: Unfortunately this game was doomed from the start with the launch of Overwatch, but let's not forget the awesome universe that Gearbox built here. We hope this song reminds you of that!

attributes.title: Fallout 4 Love Song - "Falling for Fallout"
attributes.caption: It’s real. Fallout breaks up relationships. This 50s styled love song is ALLLL about that.
attributes.description: It’s real. Fallout breaks up relationships. This 50s styled love song is ALLLL about that.

attributes.title: Dark Souls III Rap - "Darkness Falling"
attributes.caption: Dark Souls III continues the tradition of painfully difficult gameplay as do we with video game raps.
attributes.description: Dark Souls III continues the tradition of painfully difficult gameplay as do we with video game raps.

attributes.title: GTA V Mega Ramp Rap
attributes.caption: Why are Mega Ramps so awesome? The answer is obvious. In case you need to hear all the reasons why, we made this song. Thanks to Neebs Gaming for their verses.
attributes.description: Why are Mega Ramps so awesome? The answer is obvious. In case you need to hear all the reasons why, we made this song. Thanks to Neebs Gaming for their verses.

attributes.title: Doom Rap - "Fight Like Hell"
attributes.caption: DOOM Guy goes off dropping bars and slaying demons!
attributes.description: DOOM Guy goes off dropping bars and slaying demons!

attributes.title: Sans and Papyrus Song - "To the Bone"
attributes.caption: Sans and Papyrus sing a song to you after you've fallen into the Underground.
attributes.description: Sans and Papyrus sing a song to you after you've fallen into the Underground.
attributes.display_title: Sans and Papyrus Song - "To the Bone"

attributes.title: Gang Beast DRUNK Rap
attributes.caption: So we got drunk and did this whole video end to end in one night...did I mention we were drunk?
attributes.description: So we got drunk and did this whole video end to end in one night...did I mention we were drunk?

attributes.title: The Markiplier Rap
attributes.caption: Markiplier has been an awesome staple in the YouTube community and we decided to make a song about him. This is a song not only for Markiplier but his community of fans. We hope this is the song you always deserved!
attributes.description: Markiplier has been an awesome staple in the YouTube community and we decided to make a song about him. This is a song not only for Markiplier but his community of fans. We hope this is the song you always deserved!

attributes.title: No Man's Sky Song - "Stargazer"
attributes.caption: Hello Stargazers! No matter how you feel about the game, there is no doubt this song is a perfect companion to a No Man's Sky adventure! May the stars be with you friends!
attributes.description: Hello Stargazers! No matter how you feel about the game, there is no doubt this song is a perfect companion to a No Man's Sky adventure! May the stars be with you friends!

attributes.title: Pokemon GO Song - "We All Evolve"
attributes.caption: Pokemon GO has taken the world by storm and we're here to add a soundtrack to the phenomenon.
attributes.description: Pokemon GO has taken the world by storm and we're here to add a soundtrack to the phenomenon.

attributes.title: Battlefield 1 Rap - "The World's The War"
attributes.caption: Battlefield is here to reign supreme and here's an epic rap to display that! Oh and we got the best Battlefielders ever to join us on this track! Thanks to Neebs Gaming for their vocals.
attributes.description: Battlefield is here to reign supreme and here's an epic rap to display that! Oh and we got the best Battlefielders ever to join us on this track! Thanks to Neebs Gaming for their vocals.

attributes.title: Sans and Papyrus Song - "To the Bone" (Animated)
attributes.caption: Sans and Papyrus sing a song to you after you've fallen into the Underground. BUT this time in animated in beautiful Source Filmmaker!
attributes.description: Sans and Papyrus sing a song to you after you've fallen into the Underground. BUT this time in animated in beautiful Source Filmmaker!
attributes.display_title: Sans and Papyrus Song - "To the Bone" (Animated)

attributes.title: Titanfall 2 Rap - "Aligned with Giants"
attributes.caption: Stand by for Titanbars.
attributes.description: Stand by for Titanbars.

attributes.title: Dishonored 2 Rap - "Honor"
attributes.caption: We missed Dishonored the first time around song-wise. BUT this Dishonored 2 Rap should make up for it!
attributes.description: We missed Dishonored the first time around song-wise. BUT this Dishonored 2 Rap should make up for it!

attributes.title: Call of Duty Infinite Warfare Rap - "Unlimited"
attributes.caption: We didn't know if this music video was gonna happen, BUT the game's single player changed our mind. And so here is our Call of Duty Infinite Warfare Rap!
attributes.description: We didn't know if this music video was gonna happen, BUT the game's single player changed our mind. And so here is our Call of Duty Infinite Warfare Rap!
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty Infinite Warfare Rap - "Unlimited"

attributes.title: Hello Neighbor Rap - "Hello and Goodbye"
attributes.caption: So what is this neighbor up to?! We haven’t the slightest idea, BUT here’s a rap for Hello Neighbor.
attributes.description: So what is this neighbor up to?! We haven’t the slightest idea, BUT here’s a rap for Hello Neighbor.
